Elements.Body: I’m wondering if going to this carnival is worth it. Same cute shit every year. Doesn’t mean anything for seniors, we’re less than a week from being out of the shithole. There’s no way they can endear us now.
Don’t you have anyone you wanna see?

Oh fuck off. I mean if we’re headed to Dandelion anyway, I might as well show. Maybe I’ll dunk some freshmen. I was gonna chill with Kat but I don’t know, she’s busy lately. I’m not trying to seem clingy or anything, you know?

You know the answer. I mean if we’re headed to Dandelion anyway, I might as well show. Maybe I’ll dunk some freshmen. I was gonna chill with Kat but I don’t know, she’s busy lately. I’m not trying to seem clingy or anything, you know?
Are you serious? You two aren’t even dating.
Dude, she actually likes spending time with you.

LMAO chill. She’s still got a year here. Whether or not we deal with this Nightmare bullshit doesn’t change the fact that teachers will try to shove shit through her ears while blaming her for not keeping up.

Fucking wild, isn’t it? She’s still got a year here. Whether or not we deal with this Nightmare bullshit doesn’t change the fact that teachers will try to shove shit through her ears while blaming her for not keeping up.
Jesus, give the I-hate-school thing a rest.
Don’t underestimate what some human contact can do for a person like that.
